sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Create High Priority Legal request NeedIt Task
Create Human Resources request NeedIt Task
Set State to Awaiting Approval and assign to Beth Anglin
Update NeedIt State to Close Complete
Get approval from Requested for's Manager
